message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a highly valuable item, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with the deal.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of your product,  $900000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $850000 for it. This is a fair price, considering the value you're placing on it and my own budget constraints.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $875000. This is a fair compromise that still reflects the value I believe the product holds. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
